snippet.title: Deathbound - Accepted by Death | DLC Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Deathbound DLC – Accepted by Death will be available on October 28th.

Enter the liminal space between Life and Death in the epic Deathbound DLC. Defeat bosses representing the five stages of grief to unlock the final showdown. Face the challenge of Boss Rush mode, where every death is permanent! Do you have what it takes to conquer Grief and rest in peace?

Steam - https://bit.ly/Deathbound_DLC_Steam
Xbox - https://bit.ly/Deathbound_DLC_Xbox
PlayStation - Available on the Release Day

▬▬ Deathbound is available now▬▬

Steam - https://bit.ly/DeathboundSteam
Playstation 5 - https://bit.ly/Deathbound_PlayStation
GOG - https://bit.ly/Deathbound_GOG
Xbox - https://bit.ly/Deathbound_Xbox
Epic - https://bit.ly/Deathbound_EpicGamesStore

Deathbound is an Action RPG set in a world where Faith and Science clash. Absorb the essences of fallen warriors to harness their powers and abilities. Survive in a brutal reality where Life and Death were never more conflicted.

▬▬ 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐲 𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐒𝐨𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐌𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐚 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐮𝐩𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 ▬▬

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deathboundgame/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@deathboundgame/
FB: https://www.facebook.com/deathboundgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/deathboundgame/
